studyArms.name: ALXN1840 Single-Arm
studyArms.description: Single-arm, open-label, repeat-dose administration of ALXN1840 initiated at 15 mg once daily for approximately 28 days, followed by intra-patient titration to 30 mg once daily on Day 29, with allowable dose modification between 15 mg every other day and 30 mg/day based on safety.

studyCohorts.name: Cohort 1: Treatment-experienced
studyCohorts.characteristic: Participants with Wilson disease who have received Wilson disease therapy (standard of care therapies or ALXN1840) for more than 28 days prior to enrollment.

studyCohorts.name: Cohort 2: Treatment-naïve
studyCohorts.characteristic: Participants with Wilson disease who have received Wilson disease therapy for 28 days or less prior to enrollment.

arms.name: ALXN1840 Single-Arm
arms.description: Single-arm, open-label, repeat-dose administration of ALXN1840 initiated at 15 mg once daily for approximately 28 days, followed by intra-patient titration to 30 mg once daily on Day 29, with allowable dose modification between 15 mg every other day and 30 mg/day based on safety.

cohorts.name: Cohort 1: Treatment-experienced
cohorts.characteristic: Participants with Wilson disease who have received Wilson disease therapy (standard of care therapies or ALXN1840) for more than 28 days prior to enrollment.

cohorts.name: Cohort 2: Treatment-naïve
cohorts.characteristic: Participants with Wilson disease who have received Wilson disease therapy for 28 days or less prior to enrollment.

epochs.name: Screening
epochs.description: Pre-enrollment evaluations to determine eligibility; participants check in to the clinical research unit on Day -8.

epochs.name: Run-in / Baseline Diet Equilibration and Pretreatment Balance
epochs.description: Inpatient Period 1, Day -8 to Day -5: diet equilibration on copper/molybdenum-controlled diet (Day -7 through Day -5); Day -4 through Day -1: measurement of pretreatment copper and molybdenum balance with intake and output collections while off chelator therapy.

epochs.name: Treatment Period 1 – ALXN1840 15 mg/day Accumulation
epochs.description: Day 1 to approximately Day 9: initiation of ALXN1840 at 15 mg once daily; intensive intake/output collections from Day 1 through Day 8; PK/PD sampling including 24-hour profiles on Day 1; participants remain inpatient until Day 9.

epochs.name: Outpatient Period (on 15 mg/day)
epochs.description: Day 9 to Day 22/23: participants may be discharged from the clinical research unit and continue daily 15 mg ALXN1840 dosing as outpatients; outpatient period may be extended up to an additional 14 days with investigator approval; participants use SMS text messaging to confirm dosing.

epochs.name: Treatment Period 2 – 15 mg/day Steady State and 30 mg/day Accumulation/Steady State
epochs.description: Inpatient Period 2, Day 23 to Day 40: participants reinitiate inpatient stay on Day 22 or 23; remain on copper/molybdenum-controlled diet; intake and output collections from Day 25 through Day 39 to assess copper and molybdenum balance at 15 mg/day steady state and after titration to 30 mg/day on Day 29; includes PK/PD 24‑hour profiles on Days 25, 29, and 39.

epochs.name: End of Study / Discharge
epochs.description: Completion of Inpatient Period 2 by Day 40 with final assessments of safety, copper and molybdenum balance, and pharmacokinetics; end of study defined per protocol (not fully detailed in excerpt).
